discourse_list.title: Q&A - on the sanctioning of open source code and the arrest of Alex Pertsev

content.content: Hi frens , I am doing a Q&A on the sanctioning of open source code and the arrest of Alex Pertsev. I will do my best to find or give an answer to the questions you might have here:   docs.google.com    Q&A - the reason and consequences of sanctioning open source code and the... Q&A - the reason and consequences of sanctioning open source code and the arrest of Alex Pertsev  If you have any questions related to the recent sanctioning of open source code or the arrest of Alex Pertsev, or if you know the answer to a...
This topic was automatically closed 90 days after the last reply. New replies are no longer allowed.
